subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Trying to write a better ending to his career, Petr Sykora has 13 goals for the Devils, with whom he spent seven seasons and won a Stanley Cup in 2000.
snippet: Trying to write a better ending to his career, Petr Sykora has 13 goals for the Devils, with whom he spent seven seasons and won a Stanley Cup in 2000.
